message: I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for $14,000. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested, but $14,000 is a little steep for me. Would you consider $12,500?

I understand you're looking for a good deal, Bob. I can do $13,500, but that's as low as I can go. I've already got another interested buyer willing to pay $12,000, so I need to make sure I get a good price for myself.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, Alice.  While I know it's worth a good amount, $13,000 is the most I can justify spending on it right now.
I'm trying to find a middle ground, Bob. I can do $13,250, but I really think you're getting a great deal at that price. Let's meet in the middle!
